msg: Book Spanish. Lifted lock of ch02.xml due to inactivity.

author: gradha

author: ringstrom
msg: Make mailer.py use the new ACTION revprop-change hook script argument
to indicate in the email if the revprop was added, modified or
deleted.  Generate diffs for modified revprops.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py
(main): Add action parameter and pass it on to PropChange.
(NamedTemporaryFile): Compatibility implementation for pre 2.3
pythons.
(PropChange.__init__): Store the action and cfg parameters.
(PropChange.generate): Check the action and generate different
content for added, modified or deleted revprops.
(usage): Add ACTION to the argument list.

author: ringstrom
msg: Add a new parameter when calling the pre and post revprop hook scripts
to indicate whether the property was added, modified or deleted.
Update the template hook scripts to document the new parameter.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/fs-wrap.c
(svn_repos_fs_change_rev_prop2): Determine the action and update the
calls to svn_repos__hooks_{pre,post}_revprop_change.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/repos.h
(svn_repos__hooks_pre_revprop_change): Add action parameter and
update docstring.
(svn_repos__hooks_post_revprop_change): Likewise.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/hooks.c
(svn_repos__hooks_pre_revprop_change,
svn_repos__hooks_post_revprop_change): Supply the action character
as an argument to the hook scripts.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/repos.c
(create_hooks): Update the revprop hook script templates.
